Name: Viren Sareen
Intro: Fueled by a passion for software development and a drive for excellence, I am a Microsoft certified computer science graduate with hands-on experience in C#, SQL, Angular, and more. My diverse work experience, from developing API's and micro-services to migrating code to Git, has honed my problem-solving skills and ability to mentor junior colleagues. With a track record of delivering API changes independently and enabling Specflow testing with .NET Core applications, I am confident in my ability to bring value to any software development team.
